thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 11 of 735
thread.title: GORDON
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by GORDON

author: GORDON
title: GORDON
text: Car great, price was dearer than normal but it was a long weekend so I guess the supply and demand issue cones to the fore. Love the top dog deals BUT dudes you need to work on your first impression. When people are getting off a plane, hauling luggage for seems like miles from T4 at Melbourne, would it hurt you be greeted with a smile :) seems this was too much even with me over compensating with niceness still nothing. Such a great company and general deals but a smile and a sense of thankfulness for choosing Redspot would go a long way.
